name: Another Game ?!?!?!?
description:
How 2 Play:

- A / D to move paddles

- W to dash to nearest enemy. You can only dash while in the air and it consumes energy! Land to recharge

- Combo increases damage with each successive hit and resets when you land; increases your first hit damage dealt after reset.

Music: 

RedBone128 - Second Chance, The Final Battle

EpicJapanMusic - Emperor's Battle
